title: NIMIN Womens Mid Waist Jeans Loose Straight Wide Leg Boyfriend Jeans Casual Y2K Denim Pants with Pockets
description: 💗 Material: Made of medium weight washed denim fabric, these jeans are super soft, comfortable and flattering. Slight stretch in the fabric, hugs in all the right places.
💗 Style: Boyfriend denim pants with slightly wide legs, the cut is slenderizing yet loose but not too baggy. A must-have to your closet.

💗 Features: Straight wide leg jeans provides a streamlined silhouette without clinging too tightly to the legs, offering a flattering look. Mid-waist keeps your stomach comfortable. These are versatile pieces to add to your wardrobe.

💗 Occasions & Match: Baggy jeans fit so many different body shapes and are suitable for all informal occasions. Vintage y2k boyfriend jeans are perfect for casual daily, school, work, office, street, shopping, travel, lounge.

💗 Size Guide & Customer Service: 📣📣📣We strongly suggest that you have your body measurements taken first, and then refer to our size chart before order. 💌Womens wide leg trousers pants are sold with a 30-day, full-money-back warranty and can be returned no questions asked.
